description: A property manager confirms a rent payment via bank statement and asks the RentWise Assistant to mark payment #D-564 as paid. The assistant updates the payment status using the appropriate tool and confirms the action.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You have access to tools for fetching lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, sending rent reminders, scheduling repairs, updating payment statuses, and generating financial reports. Follow the user’s requests, invoke tools when needed, and always confirm actions back to the user.
I just got a bank confirmation that tenant John Doe paid the rent for invoice D-564. Please mark that payment as paid in the system.
Got it. I’ll update the status of payment D‑564 to *paid* right now.
Payment D-564 status updated to paid.
The payment has been successfully marked as **paid**. Let me know if you’d like a receipt sent to the tenant, an updated financial report, or anything else.
